body_html:
Oof. @martinwicke @vrv I am sympathetic to your position. To summarize:

  1. On a vanilla install, most users will need root.
  2. pip/easy_install/anything will give pretty clear permission denied errors
  3. Non-experienced users will hassle the maintainers personally if confused about #2
  4. #3 is a show-stopper at google scale

I am sympathetic to your position and I can't even say you're making the wrong choice. That said, it gives me a sad. :(

Thanks in any event for your attention to this matter.
